system.availability: Master-Crafted Relic Auspex of the Deathwatch. Works as regular Auspex but has +30 to Awareness Tests to detect Daemons and only +5 against other adversaries. Can also provide cryptic clues or hints of impending Daemonic Activity.
system.cost: Officially belongs to the Grey Knights, they think it lost, and would be annoyed to find the Deathwatch have it.
